# Lumière Award for Best First Film

}}
The Lumière Award for Best First Film () is an award presented annually by the Académie des Lumières since 2014. It was previously known as the Heike Hurst Award for Best First Film, in honour of the film critic.
Winners and nominees
In the following lists, the titles and names with a blue background are the winners and recipients respectively; those not in bold are the nominees.
